name: Tycho Crater
description: A prominent lunar impact crater located in the southern lunar highlands. It is estimated to be 108 million years old and is one of the Moon's brightest craters.

name: Copernicus Crater
description: A lunar impact crater located in the eastern Oceanus Procellarum. It is a relatively young crater, formed about 800 million years ago.

name: Sea of Tranquility
description: The landing site of Apollo 11, the first crewed lunar landing in 1969. This vast, dark plain is known as a lunar mare.
